title: Entertainment Live: Doctor Who teased; Cilla Black's 'last interview' - BBC News
summary: doctor who fans treated to new image .

documents.title: that 's all folks !
text: is that the time already ?
it 's time for us to clock off .
we 'll leave you with a slight mishap from this morning 's broadcast on the bbc news channel , where presenter carole walker was caught grooming after the camera cut to her early .
she styled the barnet perfectly , although her bag remained on the desk .
it 's almost as good as bbc sport 's chris mitchell , who recently signed off a report by using an imaginary ipad .
do n't try that at work .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: 'we 're going to kick some martian ass '
text: 20th century fox has released a new clip from ridley scott 's eagerly anticipated sci-fi film the martian , starring matt damon .
the clip - claimed to be from the mars mission 's archives - features interviews with crew members after they 've been kept in isolation for 10 days as part of their training .

when asked what he was thinking about during his segregation , it transpired damon 's character mark watney was kept up at night with mind-bending conundrums like `` how come aquaman can control whales ? ''
and when a fellow crew member is asked if he has any fears , he responds : `` no i 'm german , we do n't feel fear . ''
it 's unlikely the comedy `` archive footage '' will be in the final film , but it may feature on the dvd extras .

documents.title: how much ? !
text: forbes has released its list of the world 's highest-paid actors - for the first time , including actors who work outside the us movie industry .
the number crunchers measure earnings before subtracting management fees and taxes over the past year .
unsurprisingly , robert downey jr tops the list with $ 80m in earnings thanks to blockbusters like avengers : age of ultron .
perhaps more surprising is jackie chan 's position at number two with $ 50m , thanks to being the biggest movie star in china .
three bollywood stars - amitabh bachchan , salman khan and akshay kumar also feature in the top 10 .
the 34 highest paid actors came from seven countries - with james bond star daniel craig the only british actor to feature at number 15 with $ 27m .
here 's the top 10 :

documents.title: hot pursuit bombs at uk box office
text: reese witherspoon 's latest comedy , hot pursuit , has gone down like a lead balloon in uk cinemas .
the film , which also stars sofia vergara , opened at number seven last weekend , taking a measly £ 311,673 - with average takings of just £ 959 at each of the 325 locations it was screened at .
tom cruise 's mission : impossible - rogue nation easily took the number one spot , taking £ 5.35m in its first weekend .
it averaged £ 9,355 in takings across 572 locations .
here 's how the top five looked :
source : rentrak

documents.title: d & d set for big screen
text: a film based on the popular fantasy role-playing game dungeons and dragons is headed for cinemas after a long-running legal dispute over who owned the rights .
the warner bros. movie - which will be set in the popular forgotten realms world - will be based on a script by wrath of the titans writer david leslie johnson .
`` this is far and away the most well-known brand in fantasy , which is the genre that drives the most passionate film followings , '' warner bros. greg silverman said .
`` d & d has endless creative possibilities , giving our film-makers immense opportunities to delight and thrill both fans and moviegoers new to the property . ''
a d & d film was previously released in 2000 , starring thora birch and jeremy irons , but it was a commercial and critical flop .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: cilla black to be returned home
text: cilla black 's family has been given permission to return her body home to the uk for her funeral .
a post-mortem revealed she died of a stroke following a fall at her spanish villa .
her sons , robert , ben and jack , said :
we are devastated by the sad loss of our mother , but have been deeply touched by all the kind messages of support from her friends , fans , the public and media .
we would like to thank everyone , especially the people of liverpool .
the tributes and condolences have really helped us through these difficult times .
the spanish authorities have now told us we are able to bring mum home , which we hope to do as quickly as possible .
we would also like to thank all those involved for their assistance with this matter .
we respectfully request for our continued privacy to grieve .

documents.title: breakingcilla black died following stroke
text: a post mortem into the death of cilla black has revealed she died following a stroke .
she was found unresponsive at her home in spain by her son at the weekend .
the coroner 's report said she was sunbathing on her private terrace at her villa in estepona , got up , lost her balance and fell - hitting her head which knocked her unconscious .
she subsequently died of a stroke .

text: good news if you 've been looking forward to carey mulligan 's new film , suffragette - the movie 's release date has been brought forward a couple of weeks to 12 october .
the news was announced with a new poster , featuring helena bonham carter and meryl streep , who plays activist emmeline pankhurst .
suffragette 's new uk release date is monday 12 october .

documents.title: why we 'll miss cilla
text: cilla black made so many appearances on bbc radio 4 over the years , the team have put together 11 reasons why they 'll miss the presenter - pulled together from her desert island discs appearances .
our favourite reason is because she always took her chip pan with her when she went out to her spanish holiday home .
author: BBC Radio 4

documents.title: picasso seized by corsican authorities
text: police in corsica have seized a picasso painting worth more than £ 17m ( 25m euros ) from a vessel headed for switzerland .
the artwork , titled head of a young woman , is considered to be a national treasure by spain - which had barred its export .

it was seized by authorities on thursday after the ship 's captain could only present two documents regarding the painting , one of which was a spanish court judgement from may this year , ordering it not to be taken out of the country .
the painting is owned by spanish banker jaime botin , whose family founded the santander banking group .
the 79-year-old was not aboard the vessel , which is owned by the bank .
french customs officials are now awaiting an official request from spain to recover the painting .

documents.title: cilla black - latest
text: cilla black 's son says he has received a copy of the autopsy report `` and it is conclusive '' .
he adds he will release a statement soon .

documents.title: return of dirk gently ?
text: dirk gently , the holistic detective series axed by the bbc three years ago , could be heading back to tv .
america has announced a new show is being developed based on the books written by the hitchhikers guide to the galaxy author douglas adams .
the series starred stephen mangan as a detective who opens an agency based on the `` fundamental interconnectedness of all things '' .
america president sarah barnett made the announcement as part of a slate of projects unveiled at the television critics association in los angeles .
author: Chortle

documents.title: star smiles
text: the age of celebrity has been around a lot longer than you think .
a new exhibition of celebrity portraits reveal the side of celebs that are often kept hidden .
like the rare gem of joan crawford ( above ) taken around 1939 , in which you can just about make out her freckles .
see more

documents.title: happy 40th king arthur
text: the 40th anniversary of monty python and the holy grail is being celebrated with a screening in more than 500 uk cinemas for one night only on 14 october .

for the first time the film will also be shown in a brand new sing-a-long version and will be accompanied by a specially filmed introduction from terry jones , terry gilliam , michael palin , eric idle and john cleese .
audiences are being encouraged to come along dressed up as their favourite character .

documents.title: china accused of ripping off frozen
text: there 's been a bit of a hubbub over china 's new theme song for the beijing 2022 winter olym and its somewhat striking resemblance to the hit tune let it go from disney 's frozen .
listen to them both and see what you think .
many people have commented on the olym song , titled the snow and ice dance , on youtube on the similarity .
`` everyone involved with this song should be ashamed , '' one person wrote .
`` the fake never bothered me anyway , '' another joked .
the beijing games ' organising committee and disney have yet to comment on the alleged similarity .
read more on this story .

documents.title: do n't mention the c-word
text: no , not that one .
there may still be 143 sleeps until christmas but the royal shakespeare company has already announced its coming shows over the festive period .
wendy & peter pan - ella hickson 's retelling of jm barrie 's children 's book , previously staged in 2013 - is being revived with new music and cast members .

queen anne - a new play about the relationship between queen anne and the duchess of marlborough - will star the other boleyn girl actress jodhi may ( below ) in the title role alongside californication 's natascha mcelhone .
restoration comedy love for love is also to be performed for the first time by the rsc .

documents.title: minions cause chaos in dublin
text: imagine the scene , you 're driving down the road and a giant minion falls out of the sky and blocks your path .
that 's exactly what happened in dublin yesterday after an 12 metre ( 40ft ) inflatable escaped from a nearby fairground and landed on a busy road .
irish police were called and with the help of passers-by , they managed to let the air out of the yellow banana-loving creature .
a taken at the scene was posted later on twitter .

documents.title: search for the x busker
text: public busking auditions are being held for the first time in london underground stations .
thousands of performers have applied for one of 75 four-year licences which will give them access to pitches across the underground .
more than 200 of them have been invited to audition in front of a panel of three .

documents.title: joe jackson out of hospital
text: joe jackson , the patriarch of the musical jackson family has been discharged from the sao paulo hospital where he had been treated following a stroke .
jackson - who was in brazil to celebrate his 87th birthday - was diagnosed with a stroke associated with cardiac arrhythmia , the albert einstein hospital said .
a spokesperson said jackson 's health had improved enough to warrant his release on monday .

documents.title: schumer makes gun plea
text: an emotional amy schumer has called for greater restrictions on gun ownership , following a shooting at a cinema screening her latest comedy the trainwreck .
two women were killed and several people were injured after the gunman started shooting at the cinema in louisiana last month .
now she has joined her cousin , senator charles schumer , in calling for individual states to submit information to an fbi database used to screen gun buyers .
she said : `` people say , 'well , you 're never going to be able to stop crazy people from doing crazy things ' , but they 're wrong .
there is a way to stop them . ''

documents.title: drama on good morning britain
text: good morning britain 's normal live show was forced off the air this morning after a fire alarm went off in the building .
presenters ben shepherd and susanna reid had just begun interviewing emmerdale stars charley webb and anthony quinlan when the alarm went off and they had to evacuate the building at 08:24 bst .
a previous edition of the breakfast programme was broadcast for five minutes until the end of the show .

the first 20 minutes of follow-on show lorraine was replaced with a repeat of the special programme broadcast to mark 30 years of lorraine kelly 's career , while a message on-screen read : `` sorry for the interruption to our normal programme we 'll be back to the lorraine studio as soon as possible . ''
normal programming resumed at 08:50 bst .
itv said in a statement : `` it was an isolated incident which was quickly resolved .
the building was evacuated as a precaution . ''
reid later tweeted she was back in the itv building and everything was fine .
back in the building - all fine , only thing lost in the fire alert seems to be ben 's tie

documents.title: consciously uncoupling . denied .
text: when gwyneth paltrow announced last year , via her goop lifestyle website , that she and coldplay frontman chris martin were `` consciously uncoupling '' ( i.e .
getting a divorce ) , social media howled with amusement .
it quickly became one of the most derided terms on the internet .
`` deluded tosh , ''
but now the actress-slash-entrepreneur
`` when i announced that i was separating on the website , [ editor elise loehnen ] titled the piece 'conscious uncoupling ' and i had no idea . ''
does that mean she unconsciously consciously uncoupled ?

documents.title: towie tours upset locals
text: tours , stag parties and hen nights in brentwood , inspired by itv reality show the only way is essex , are `` putting off a demographic of local people '' .
brentwood borough councillor chris hossack said residents did not `` feel comfortable around the whole hen night , saturday night thing in brentwood '' .
still the volume of revellers in luminous fake tan must save money on the number of streetlamps ?

documents.title: googly over london
text: london is the most googled city when it comes to people searching about art and culture .
new research to launch london 's autumn season of culture , also revealed the science museum is the most googled museum in the world .
the natural history museum is second and third is the british museum .
google said london 's theatres also generate more searches than in any other city .
london is also the most searched for city in the world to visit , figures show .
mayor boris johnson said : `` london is without a doubt the cultural capital of the world . ''

documents.title: cilla 's 'last interview '
text: an interview cilla black did with a canadian radio station in june looks likely to have been her last interview .
and it makes poignant listening in parts following her death at the weekend .
when zoomerradio dj robbie lane asked whether she might go on tour again , she replied : `` i do n't even sing in the shower these days , never mind touring . ''
and when he mentioned that anyone who had a heart was the biggest-selling single by a female artist in the uk in the 1960s , a surprised cilla said she never knew that was the case .
`` i 'm 72 years of age and for all that time i did n't know , '' she said .
`` i did n't know well i never .
i can die happy now , '' she added with a chuckle .
the star was promoting a canadian broadcast of cilla , the recent british-made docudrama about her life .
zoomermedia founder
rip to a legend # cillablack .
listen to her last extensive interview here @ twitterid on canada 's @ twitterid

documents.title: together and apart
text: the latest news in the wacky world of celebrity marriages .
will smith has taken the unusual step of announcing that , contrary to reports , he and actress wife jade pinkett smith are not splitting up .
writing on
`` so , in the interest of redundant , repetitious , over and over-again-ness jada and i are not getting a divorce ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ''
sadly , one of showbusiness 's longer-lasting marriages is coming to an end .
gwen stefani has filed for divorce from her british husband of nearly 13 years , singer gavin rossdale .
stefani filed her petition for divorce on monday at los angeles superior court citing irreconcilable differences .
they married at london 's covent garden in september 2002 and have three sons together .

documents.title: bobbi kristina buried with whitney
text: the body of bobbi kristina brown has been taken to a new jersey cemetery to be buried next to her mother , singer whitney houston .
a gold hearse took the body to fairview cemetery on monday , with two vehicles carrying relatives - including singer dionne warwick - following behind .
the burial was reserved for friends and family , although about a dozen fans were seen at the gates .
brown died at a hos on 26 july , aged 22 , six months after she was found unresponsive in a bathtub .
